twitch_info.title: Highlight: 225+ Hours of Enhanced Interrogation Techniques

message.body: the hi
you're on a state of destruction now
yes, my daily dose of destruction
I also made the practice tool sound sync up, but that guy is not here yet
but I will play the attack a bit, and I want your opinion on how well the sync is now
that's cool !!
a friend of mine also wants to have ds practice so id like to give him a link to it :)
that's a perfect sync
https://ln5.sync.com/dl/28e44fea0/wistkhmi-qrwxean4-tv3h9urr-un9n82rn
thanks for the reassurance
I'm glad I finally got it right
share the practice tool link with as many people as you want, let them all experience the joys of DS
hes grateful
not mediafire though
first time im seeing this site
yeah, if you want it to be mediafire, you can upload it to mediafire if you want
i see*
I use this site because it's cheap, and because mediafire cannot handle the amount of files I have very well
reasonable
imagine if blue had made a buffed version of destruction state like he made a buffed version of fish
just sent the link
wonderful
hahah i suppose only blue would clear it
yeah, that's probably true
i saw his recent tweet that he wants to make "super duper fish"
oh, I do not have access to his twitter
so that's new to me
but he wont probably do it actually
also because super fish was so good and balanced, he wants to make another Kappa
yes, he seems to be done making games
"It seems that super fish is not enough, so can I make it with super duper fish?"
that's a translated tweet
you know, if he were going to make a buffed superfish game, he should call it "ultra fish"
"I don't want to test it, so i don't make it ..."
thanks for the tweet
oh, well it definitely seems like that's not getting made them
then
yeah
i mean, he didn't test crazy mayumushi either....
i assume his most recent avoidance is ao stage?
no
well, depends on what you count
since 2020 there's no games he's making?
the most recent serious avoidance is ao stage I think
or it might be this https://delicious-fruit.com/ratings/game_details.php?id=21795
can't remember which came out later
ok im bad at english today
not an english day
yeah, some days you just aren't performing at your peak, just like in avoidance
oooh so true
about avoidances
but anyways, the absolute most recent game he's released is https://delicious-fruit.com/ratings/game_details.php?id=23028
what a fancy font
destruction state vibes
Kappa
in fact, it is the same font as the one on the title screen LUL
ILS  Script
I don't know what my break screen will look like when I play a different game after I beat DS
you know this game so well that you know even the font of its title screen
yeah, it took a few hours of searching
depends what game youll choose after clearing ds...)
yes, I have a few games that I could choose
theoretically, Last Tis, Mayumushi, Galaxy collapse
I think I will play galaxy collapse though
oh, soulless hardmode as well, but I don't want to play that
discard last tis from this list.........
you played it?
i just know this would be your worst time spent on videogames ever
LUL
soulless would be pretty good idea
soulless is easier than DS, I don't want to play something easier
even normal mode ver would be pogchamp
oh
ok then
yeah, I usually just want something harder than anything I've played before
which is why I won't have many options after DS
LUL
there really is a serious lack of high difficulty avoidances
true
i thought if i choose ao stage after ds clear it will go way easier than ds
that's false
yeah, it's easier, but not that much
it doesn't just suddenly become a cakewalk
65 hours already and im almost destroyed
by rng
any particular attack's rng?
or just in general?
at least outro rng that killed me in the same place 4 times in a row already
that experience
justdont died a ton of times to the last attack I think
seems that avoidance is really annoying
true
nevertheless
the music is still a banger
pump it is another song I don't like LUL
it's just not my kind of thing I guess
and the avoidance itself looks really delightful
the production quality on it is definitely his best work
I personally think his magnum opus is mayumushi though
drop part with its patterns is such a cool thing to me that actually made me start grinding it
oh, with the windmill and stuff?
yeah
epic thing
yeah, I think that's probably the best part
too bad the rest of it has some issues
the windmill is kinda unreadable at the end of the attack
it goes too fast
to react
I think I've seen people say it's fair
maybe you need more practice?
if only i had haha
anyway most of deaths on windmill is absolutely my fault
so id agree
I wouldn't have the patience to grind something like that
the only reason I can put up with DS is because I know it's the hardest thing I've ever done
can't want to see you on 15th rank of ds in hof
it might not be the 15th, I think some other people are playing it
but maybe it will, who knows
I will even get to add myself to the spreadsheet, because I'm a maintainer LUL
obama medal image lfg
everyone i saw grinding ds is done with it already
yeah, in terms of people who streamed it
@mastermaxify hi PogChamp
but, I've had people ask for the practice tool in the past
so either they just want to mess around, which is possible, or they are also grinding it offline
idk they probably just want to have fun there
that's probably true, given the commitment this game requires to clear
play it a bit and then delete
it doesn't take as long for players who are already experienced though
if someone like, say, subfusc moose were to start playing it, they would beat it before me anyway
yeah, advanced players spend here like 15 hours and clear without any effort haha
sinkun zero maxify moment
pretty much
I'd say 30 hour average
sometimes more if they die a lot to final, like casualcrap
sometimes less if they first try final, like zero
oh yeah, ds was a hell for casualcrap
you watched his stream of the grind?
ive seen some twitch clips of him playing it
and his clear reaction completely says it
yeah, I've only seen the clear, with the beautiful clear reaction
the title of my stream is a reference to his clear
the shower dodge on his clear tho
if you remember
"enhanced interrogation techniques" is a euphemism for torture, and casualcrap called DS "37 hours of pure torture"
he has a lot of crazy dodges in his clear, but the shower one takes the cake
ok now i understand the title of your stream
bursts was crazy too I believe
I was going to put something like "225+ hours of pure torture", but it turns out that you can't put the word "torture" in a twitch title
if you put this title itll seem like you're suffering here
but i see you enjoy playing it
It's a mix of suffering and enjoyment
practicing can bring you suffering?
I think I enjoy this game more than casualcrap though
practicing not so much, but attempts definitely bring suffering
near the end of the fish grind, I was very discouraged
but i assure one beautiful day you'll defeat this game...)
thought it would take 30-60 more hours
and then I cleared the next day
so yeah, I believe that the day I beat destruction state will come
I've only experienced it twice, but when you finally beat the boss you have been grinding for weeks or months, it is a very satisfying feeling
you'll be the second person who's first getting into hof is ds clear
who is the first?
me :)
oh, of course, my bad
that was quite astonishing
i thought it would be something like ex piano
wow, I guess that just goes to show what you can accomplish when you don't know how hard it's supposed to be
but with 12 red piano attempts it became a boring shit that i don't want to play anymore
how many hours was that?
yeah i truly didn't know the difficulty
i don't quite remember, something around 15-25 hrs already
k3 extra is not known for its great design, sadly
particularly dotkid miku
quite tilting i couldn't defeat the boss in ~5 hours as everyone else did
i had a strong confidence haha
avoidance tends to make us humble LUL
but red piano doesn't like me
ex piano is supposed to be harder than fish by a little bit, so that means it's no joke
i was surprised k3 100% was accomplished only by 5 people
the reason is ex emperor
even casualcrap cannot be bothered to beat it
god, haven't seen ex emp full fight
is it really that painful
I have only seen it, but max rates it very high on difficulty
check the Hof or his clearlist for it
it should be reasonably close to DS in difficulty
as for enjoyment, I pretty sure it's just really long and boring
ok today I can't even keep the conversation going
that's okay, I think we've had a good chat today
probably that's due to lack of sleep
incidentally, if you beat ex emperor, you can get a reward game for it, which is a different version of the fight
I hope that game ends up on the fangame archive at some point, but it's unlikely since so few people have it
emperor sy mk III?
yes
or how is it called
only 2 people beat it
true emperor fans
basically yeah
first you have to be good enough to beat ex emperor, then you have to be weird enough to want to do something similar again LUL
truuue
If I were a god player who could clear emperor in 30 hours or something, I'd probably just beat it and get the game myself
so, you streamed DS right? but you're not stream any more?
i streamed ds along with k3 true end grind
or perhaps it was just recorded
oh, ok
my clear video was from my first micro stream
i streamed ex piano then in a completely tired state i opened ds
5 mins passed and i am already shocked
Kappa
I also cleared fish after a long day of avoidance
I was tired, but somehow I did it
I wonder how that works
i stream rarely rn because ao stage grind goes bad when im streaming it
it goes kinda laggy
because the game has so many graphical effects?
and my micro, which is basically my phone, also becomes laggy with ao
yeah probably that's the reason
i streamed fish recently
and i wanna be the v  by lilly
what time do you stream, I'd like to catch it some time?
we have different time zones probably
you can give the timezone and I can convert
msk
i suppose you have est time zone?
yes
we have 8 hours difference
sometimes I am awake at night anyways
it is 23:45 in my country
my sleep schedule can be like that
i can find you in discord though
here algosith#8443
don't you mind?
it's ok
pretty quick respond LUL
haha u died lorema2SMOREc
ho nojah
I mean hi
ho too I guess
making any progress?
haha u died lorema2SMOREc
0.9x speed is still a bit too much for me, but yeah, I'm getting there
I'm doing 0.8x offline
you getting full runs at 0.8x ?
even a few weeks ago, I was doing 0.7x and dying a lot
full runs from an attack 1 minute into the fight
might want to try .81 then .82 etc
the game is 50 fps, going from 0.8 to 0.82 is 1 fps
that's pretty slow
just sent a friend request :p
I might do an incremental 0.95 after 0.9, we'll see
but since I have to make a seperate exe for each one, going by increments of 0.02 seems a bit tedious
if someone turns down a friend request, I wonder if it tells that other person
does it appear in their feed "FRIEND REQUEST REJECTED"
not sure
because I just rejected someone and I wonder if they'll raise a stink
idk too
you can send me a friend request so I can reject it if you want
okay one sec
it probably doesn't say anything too mean though
the person who sent it seemed a little... off
so I don't know if there's a tantrum incoming
barricade your house just in case
that was pretty good
that's most of the hard stuff done in one shot
I wasn't watching. Do it again
oh i saw @mrdobryikot in viewer list
algo remade the practice tool
@LoremasterNojah I will try Keepo
I will post it again
now its well synced
https://ln5.sync.com/dl/28e44fea0/wistkhmi-qrwxean4-tv3h9urr-un9n82rn
with music
how convenient, don't even have to write anything in chat LUL
yeah, I'm just happy that I can give something useful to others
Thank you I uploaded
Irish monks are hardcore, wow
you're welcome
I did it again @LoremasterNojah
he did it again
bet he still wasn't looking Keepo
In fact, I did not notice any errors in the old tool either :D
"the fall" attack warp has a little sound delay
had
@MrDobryiKot yeah, the error was very small. the 4th warp from the left had music that was slightly out of sync with the avoidance
I think that's enough for the day
thanks for watching everyone <3
thanks for streaming
again
